ComicInfo.Title: The Fool Doth Think He is Wise
ComicInfo.Summary: Dying is easy; comedy is hard... Hamlet's quest to track down the wizard Shakespeare takes an interesting turn with the entrance of the witty-yet mysterious-fool Falstaff. Together they flee from the relentless assassins unleashed by Iago while Richard attempts to wrestle control from his rival Macbeth with the support of the alluring Lady Macbeth. As Falstaff himself would declare, this issue features fights, frivolities, femme fatales, faeries, and fakeries, all forming one fantastic fable.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-26 16:40:26. [CVDB223274]
ComicInfo.Characters: Falstaff, Hamlet, Lady Macbeth, Macbeth, Puck, Richard III
